messages.content: write me the story, to a fps video game, where you play as the youtuber Filthy Frank. Chapter by chapter overview.

Great, here's a detailed outline of the first chapter of the story:
Chapter 1: Filthy Frank's YouTube Adventure
* The chapter begins with a shot of Filthy Frank playing the popular video game Fortnite.
* As he plays, Filthy Frank starts to feel a strange sensation in his head. He sees a mysterious portal opening behind him, and decides to go through it.
* Filthy Frank goes through the portal and ends up in a strange, pixelated world. He realizes that he has been transported to the world of Fortnite.
* Filthy Frank is amazed by the colorful and surreal world around him. He sees other Fortnite players running around and battling each other.
* As he walks around, he sees a mysterious figure lurking in the shadows. It looks like a pixelated version of himself.
* Suddenly, the mysterious figure appears in front of Filthy Frank and introduces himself as the "YouTuber Fortnite." He explains that he has been watching Filthy Frank's videos and wants to help him become the best Fortnite player in the world.
* The YouTuber Fortnite explains that he has a special device that can help Filthy Frank gain a competitive edge in the game. He gives him a device that looks like a headset, and tells him to put it on.
* The YouTuber Fortnite tells Filthy Frank to focus on the game and not to get distracted by the distractions around him. He warns him that the other players in the game will try to sabotage him.
* Filthy Frank puts on the headset and is immediately transported to a virtual reality world. He sees a large map of the game's world, and realizes that he is at the starting point.
* The YouTuber Fortnite tells Filthy Frank to start playing the game and to use his newfound powers to help his team win.
* Filthy Frank starts to play the game and starts to gain experience points. He sees other players in the game and tries to defeat them.
* As Filthy Frank plays, he realizes that he is not alone. He sees other Fortnite players in the game and decides to team up with them. They work together to take down the other players and win the game.
* The YouTuber Fortnite helps Filthy Frank to gain new abilities and powers, making him a more effective player. He starts to become more popular among the other players in
GIVE ME A TITLE and explain more about the orginization.

Sure, here's a possible title for the story and a brief explanation of the organization:
Title: The YouTuber Fortnite
Overview: The story follows the journey of a virtual YouTuber named Filthy Frank as he becomes the most powerful player in the virtual world of Fortnite. The story is told through a series of chapters that explore Filthy Frank's journey to becoming a powerful player, the challenges he faces along the way, and his interactions with other players in the game. The organization he joins is called "YouTuber Fortnite," and it is a mysterious group that provides him with special abilities and devices to help him succeed.
